help.name: +server
help.summary: add a new server to the server list

arg.name: hostname
arg.desc: the host (or ip address) of the new server

arg.name: port
arg.desc: the port of the new server

arg.name: pass
arg.desc: the password to use for the new server

desc.line: The +server command adds a new server to the server list according
to the given arguments. The only required argument, hostname,
specifies the host or ip address that the bot will try to connect
to. If no value for port is given, the default port (set in the
config file) will be used. If no value for pass is given, then
the bot will not attempt to send any password when it connects
to the server.
Note that if you want to specify a password, you must also specify
a port, since the order of arguments is important.

help.name: -server
help.summary: remove a server from the server list

arg.name: hostname
arg.desc: the host (or ip address) of the server to remove

arg.name: port
arg.desc: the port of the server to remove

arg.name: pass
arg.desc: the password of the server to remove

desc.line: The -server command removes a server from the server list according
to the given arguments. The only required argument, hostname,
specifies the host or ip address of the server to remove. In the
event that more than one server uses the same hostname, you can
narrow down the choices by specifying the target server's port and
even password.
If more than one server matches the given criteria, the first match
will be the one deleted.

arg.name: hostname
arg.desc: the host (or ip address) of the server to jump to

arg.name: port
arg.desc: the port of the server to jump to

arg.name: pass
arg.desc: the password of the server to jump to

desc.line: The jump command disconnects from the current server (if connected)
and begins a new connection. If no server is specified, then the
bot will jump to the next position on the server list. If a server
is specified, the bot will search for the first matching server on
the server list and connect to it. If the server is not found, a
new entry is created and the bot begins connecting to it.
